main event: An aircraft mechanic reported observing a large, elliptical, aluminum-colored UFO near Brookville, Pennsylvania, on January 9, 1959.
interesting points: The object emitted intermittent flashing red and green lights., It was traveling at speeds estimated between 500 to 750 mph., The object was observed from an altitude of 3000 to 3500 ft., The pilots reported the object had no visible means of propulsion and made no sound., Ground observers also confirmed the sighting, adding credibility to the report.
sighted object: large elliptical aluminum-colored UFO with flashing lights
witness description: Aircraft mechanic and crew chief with notable military experience
